bestPractices.practice: If the author, editor or contributor is a UCAR individual, this field will autocomplete. Be sure to verify divisional information.
If the author, editor or contributor is not a UCAR individual or UCAR as an institution, this field is not required but please complete to the fullest extent possible.
As you type, institutional names will be suggested by the system. If the institution you are entering is not in this vocabulary, it will be added after verification.
Before using a new name, be sure to check the controlled vocabulary list carefully before entering the new institutional name.
Spell out new names completely, capitalizing all proper names and all major words.
Example: University Corporation for Atmospheric Research
Example: National Institute for Environmental Studies (Japan)
